content.en: Electricity price forecasting: Researchers have been investigating various methodologies and algorithms to improve the accuracy of electricity price forecasting in deregulated markets. These include stochastic time series, causal models, artificial intelligence-based models, time series analysis, feed-forward neural networks, discrete-time univariate econometric models, support vector machines, and more. By utilizing these algorithms, researchers aim to develop better strategies for predicting electricity prices in different time horizons, taking into account factors such as weather conditions, oil prices, CO2 coupons, and price histories of neighboring countries.
content.da: Elektricitetsprisprognoser: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige metoder og algoritmer for at forbedre nøjagtigheden af elektricitetsprisprognoser i deregulere markeder. Disse omfatter stokastiske tidsserier, kausale modeller, kunstig intelligens-baserede modeller, tidsserieanalyse, feed-forward neurale netværk, diskrete tidsenkelte økonometriske modeller, support vector maskiner og mere. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at udvikle bedre strategier til at forudsige elektricitetspriser i forskellige tidshorisonter, idet de tager hensyn til faktorer som vejrforhold, oliepriser, CO2-kuponer og prisudviklinger i nabolande.
